events.eventText:
You rummage through the supplies and take whatever seems useful.

Draw a supply card. You gain 1 medpac. Claim this token.

You rummage through the supplies and take whatever seems useful.

Draw a supply card. You gain 1 medpac. Claim this token.

Slipping past Imperial forces, you make your way toward the prisoners. A stolen shuttle and important access codes provide your exit point when you signal, but your pilot is getting nervous.

"...you should hurry", she says through your comlink. "Imperial fighters are coming. I'd hate to have to leave you all here."

{-} Deploy the heroes to the blue highlighted space.
{-} When a hero withdraws, he is incapacitated instead. When activating, he receives only 1 action and can only use that action to perform a move.
{-} The door to the Hallway is locked. A Rebel figure can attack the door (Health: *2*, Defense: None). A hero can interact with a door (2 {K} or {I}) to try and open it.
{-} The mission will progress when the door to the Hallway opens.
{-} The Rebels lose when all heroes are wounded.

eventActions.shortText: Open the door to the Hallway.

eventActions.theText:
{-} When a hero withdraws, he is incapacitated instead. When activating, he receives only 1 action and can only use that action to perform a move.
{-} The door to the Hallway is locked. A Rebel figure can attack the door (Health: *2*, Defense: None). A hero can interact with a door (2 {K} or {I}) to try and open it.
{-} The mission will progress when the door to the Hallway opens.
{-} The Rebels lose when all heroes are wounded.

events.eventText:
Your pilot weaves through the fire of ground troops and TIE fighters alike, blasting out of the atmosphere. Within a few moments, you're safely in hyperspace.

{-} The Rebels win the mission!
{-} Heroes receive the “Networks Restored” Reward card.
{-} Each hero receives 1 XP. Heroes receive 100 credits per hero.
{-} The Empire discards the “Supply Disruption” Reward card.

“Dont leave us!” You hear the cries of the prisoners you were forced to abandon. Even with leaving them behind, you barely manage to escape.

{-} The Rebels lose the mission.
{-} Each hero receives 1 XP. Heroes receive 100 credits per hero.
{-} The Empire discards the “Supply Disruption” Reward card.
The door opens into a long hallway and a medical station with a big bacta tank.

translatedEntityProperties.theText:
This door leads into the hallway of the facility. The prisoners must be kept somewhere behind it.

{-} The door is locked. A Rebel figure can attack the door (Health: *2*, Defense: None). A hero can interact with a door (2 {K} or {I}) to try and open it.

eventActions.tbText: As you enter the hallway, armor-plated battle droids ready their weapons.

From behind the door leading to the holding cell, you can hear hushed voices.

{-} The door to the Cell is locked. A Rebel figure can attack the door (Health: *2*, Defense: None). A hero can interact with a door (2 {K} or {I}) to try and open it.
Nearby, your escape shuttle waits, the engines already running.

{-} The door to the Shuttle is locked. An Imperial figure can attack the door (Health: *2*, Defense: 2 {G}). 
{-} The door to the Shuttle does not block movement, line of sight, adjacency, or counting spaces for adjacent Rebel figures.
{-} Rebel figures on the Shuttle gain {A}: Choose an adjacent hostile figure and test {K}. If you succeed, push that figure up to 2 spaces.

eventActions.shortText: Open the door to the Cell.

eventActions.theText:
{-} When a hero withdraws, he is incapacitated instead. When activating, he receives only 1 action and can only use that action to perform a move.
{-} The door to the Cell is locked. A Rebel figure can attack the door (Health: *2*, Defense: None). A hero can interact with a door (2 {K} or {I}) to try and open it.
{-} The door to the Shuttle is locked. An Imperial figure can attack the door (Health: *2*, Defense: 2 {G}). 
{-} The door to the Shuttle does not block movement, line of sight, adjacency, or counting spaces for adjacent Rebel figures.
{-} Rebel figures on the Shuttle gain {A}: Choose an adjacent hostile figure and test {K}. If you succeed, push that figure up to 2 spaces.
{-} The mission will progress when the door to the Cell opens.
{-} The Rebels lose when all heroes are wounded.

eventActions.mainText:
You start to force the door open.

{-} Test {K} or {I}. Apply +1 {B} for each strain token on the door, then discard all strain tokens on the door. Enter the number of successes below.

inputList.theText:
You make some progress, but the door remains shut.

{-} Place 1 strain token on the door for each {B} result gained.

events.eventText: Smashing through the cell door, you discover the terrified prisoners. Mistreatment has left many of them injured; they'll have to be carried.

translatedEntityProperties.theText:
This door leads into a tiny holding cell. Hushed voiced can be heard behind it.

{-} The door is locked. A Rebel figure can attack the door (Health: *2*, Defense: None). A hero can interact with a door (2 {K} or {I}) to try and open it.

Mona Vash, an Arcanian merchant, blinks into the sudden light, shielding her eyes with her hand.

{-} A Rebel figure can retrieve a prisoner. A figure can carry only 1 prisoner.

Boh Kallaak, a technician from Muun, looks battered and beaten. He is too weak to walk.

{-} A Rebel figure can retrieve a prisoner. A figure can carry only 1 prisoner.

Roggnar Dreek, an Ugnaught Union leader, is chained to the wall here. He is injured, but still looks defiant and unbroken.

{-} A Rebel figure can retrieve a prisoner. A figure can carry only 1 prisoner.

eventActions.tbText:
{-} Rebel mission tokens represent prisoners.
{-} A Rebel figure can retrieve a prisoner. A figure can carry only 1 prisoner.

eventActions.theText:

{-} The door to the Shuttle does not block movement, line of sight, adjacency, or counting spaces for adjacent Rebel figures.
{-} Rebel figures on the Shuttle gain {A}: Choose an adjacent hostile figure and test {K}. If you succeed, push that figure up to 2 spaces.
{-} Rebel mission tokens represent prisoners.
{-} A Rebel figure can retrieve a prisoner. A figure can carry only 1 prisoner.
{-} The mission will progress when a prisoner is retrieved.
{-} The Rebels lose when all heroes are wounded.

eventActions.mainText:
You start to force the door open.

{-} Test {K} or {I}. Apply +1 {B} for each strain token on the door, then discard all strain tokens on the door. Enter the number of successes below.

inputList.theText:
You make some progress, but the door remains shut.

{-} Place 1 strain token on the door for each {B} result gained.

events.eventText: The door collapses under the Imperial fire.

translatedEntityProperties.theText:
This door leads to the prepared escape shuttle.

{-} The door is locked. An Imperial figure can attack the door (Health: *2*, Defense: 2 {G}). 
{-} The door to the Shuttle does not block movement, line of sight, adjacency, or counting spaces for adjacent Rebel figures.

events.eventText: You help the prisoner into the shuttle.

You help the exhausted Arcanian up and lead her toward the shuttle.

{-} When a figure carrying a prisoner is on the Shuttle, the heroes claim that prisoner. Click the red highlight on the Shuttle and select "Claim Prisoner".

translatedEntityProperties.theText:
Mona Vash, an Arcanian merchant, blinks into the sudden light, shielding her eyes with her hand.

{-} A Rebel figure can retrieve a prisoner. A figure can carry only 1 prisoner.

events.eventText:
You slowly place your arms under the injured technician and carefully lift him up.

{-} When a figure carrying a prisoner is on the Shuttle, the heroes claim that prisoner. Click the red highlight on the Shuttle and select "Claim Prisoner".

translatedEntityProperties.theText:
Boh Kallaak, a technician from Muun, looks battered and beaten. He is too weak to walk.

{-} A Rebel figure can retrieve a prisoner. A figure can carry only 1 prisoner.

events.eventText:
You quickly break Roggnar's binders and help the Ugnaught to his feet, supporting him on his way to the shuttle.

{-} When a figure carrying a prisoner is on the Shuttle, the heroes claim that prisoner. Click the red highlight on the Shuttle and select "Claim Prisoner".

translatedEntityProperties.theText:
Roggnar Dreek, an Ugnaught Union leader, is chained to the wall here. He is injured, but still looks defiant and unbroken.

{-} A Rebel figure can retrieve a prisoner. A figure can carry only 1 prisoner.

events.eventText: {-} When a figure carrying a prisoner is on the Shuttle, the heroes claim that prisoner. Click the red highlight on the Shuttle and select "Claim Prisoner".

translatedEntityProperties.theText:
The escape shuttle waits with the engines running.

{-} When a figure carrying a prisoner is on the Shuttle, the heroes claim that prisoner. Click "Claim Prisoner".

eventActions.shortText: Take the prisoners to the shuttle (&Prisoners claimed&/3).

eventActions.theText:
{-} When a hero withdraws, he is incapacitated instead. When activating, he receives only 1 action and can only use that action to perform a move.
{-} The door to the Shuttle is locked. An Imperial figure can attack the door (Health: *2*, Defense: 2 {G}). 
{-} The door to the Shuttle does not block movement, line of sight, adjacency, or counting spaces for adjacent Rebel figures.
{-} Rebel figures on the Shuttle gain {A}: Choose an adjacent hostile figure and test {K}. If you succeed, push that figure up to 2 spaces.
{-} Rebel mission tokens represent prisoners.
{-} A Rebel figure can retrieve a prisoner. A figure can carry only 1 prisoner.
{-} When a figure carrying a prisoner is on the Shuttle, the heroes claim that prisoner. Click the red highlight on the Shuttle and select "Claim Prisoner".
{-} When the heroes have claimed all three prisoners, all heroes are on the Shuttle, and there are 3 or fewer Imperial figures on the Shuttle, the shuttle launches.
{-} The Rebels win when the Shuttle launches.
{-} The Rebels lose when all heroes are wounded.

events.eventText:
You finally manage to get all prisoners aboard the escape shuttle. All that is left to do is get rid of the Imperials.

{-} When all heroes are on the Shuttle and there are 3 or fewer Imperial figures on the Shuttle, click the red highlight on the shuttle and select "Launch Shuttle" to end the mission.

translatedEntityProperties.theText:
The escape shuttle waits with the engines running.

{-} When all heroes are on the Shuttle and there are 3 or fewer Imperial figures on the Shuttle, click the red highlight on the shuttle and select "Launch Shuttle" to end the mission.
